getReward(address).details: Throws if not called by same address or voter.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: Notifies gauge of gauge rewards. Assumes gauge reward tokens is 18 decimals.      If not 18 decimals, rewardRate may have rounding issues.

notifyRewardWithoutClaim(uint256).details: Notifies gauge of gauge rewards without distributing its fees.      Assumes gauge reward tokens is 18 decimals.      If not 18 decimals, rewardRate may have rounding issues.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the amount of stakingToken deposited by an account

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit LP tokens into gauge for msg.sender

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit LP tokens into gauge for any user

earned(address).notice: Returns accrued balance to date from last claim / first deposit.

fees0().notice: Cached amount of fees generated from the Pool linked to the Gauge of token0

fees1().notice: Cached amount of fees generated from the Pool linked to the Gauge of token1

feesVotingReward().notice: Address of the FeesVotingReward contract linked to the gauge

isPool().notice: Returns if gauge is linked to a legitimate Velodrome pool

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the last time the reward was modified or periodFinish if the reward has ended

lastUpdateTime().notice: Most recent timestamp contract has updated state

left().notice: Total amount of rewardToken to distribute for the current rewards period

periodFinish().notice: Timestamp end of current rewards period

rewardPerToken().notice: Get the current reward rate per unit of stakingToken deposited

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: Most recent stored value of rewardPerToken

rewardRate().notice: Current reward rate of rewardToken to distribute per second

rewardRateByEpoch(uint256).notice: View to see the rewardRate given the timestamp of the start of the epoch

rewardToken().notice: Address of the token (VELO v2) rewarded to stakers

rewards(address).notice: Cached amount of rewardToken earned for an account

stakingToken().notice: Address of the pool LP token which is deposited (staked) for rewards

totalSupply().notice: Amount of stakingToken deposited for rewards

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Cached rewardPerTokenStored for an account based on their most recent action
